description:
A fun and easy racing game for everyone!
Pass the Joy-Conâ„¢ controllers around and play with up to six players!

Unique machines with different abilities!
Featuring more than 15 exciting courses, including Classroom, Arts and Crafts Room, Science Lab, and Gym!
Pick your favorite and you're off to the races!

Drift around corners in style!
Stop your rivals in their tracks with missiles!
Use speed-up items to accelerate past the other racers!

- Time Attack -
Challenge your favorite course and beat your personal best!

- Grand Prix -
Select multiple courses and race through them in order. Aim to win the championship!

You can play with up to six players!
Let's have a blast trying for 1st place with family and friends!
name: School Race GP
intro:
Eric Eraser and friends are racing at school!?
Speed through a variety of hazards as fast as you can!
